summary: This is an email chain from August 2022 between an FBI Special Agent and Jessica-Wind Abolafia of Sanctuary for Families, regarding the finalization and approval of forms related to an anti-trafficking initiative. It shows coordination between law enforcement and a victim services organization.

persons.name: Jessica-Wind Abolafia
persons.role: Director, Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families
persons.context: She is the primary correspondent from Sanctuary for Families, following up on draft documents and forms related to an anti-trafficking initiative, seeking review and signature from the FBI.

persons.name: Erica
persons.context: Mentioned by Jessica-Wind Abolafia as someone who would be available to join a call with the FBI to discuss draft documents.

connections.description: Work together at Sanctuary for Families' Anti-Trafficking Initiative, as indicated by Jessica offering that they would both join a call with the FBI.

events.title: Draft Documents Sent for Review
events.description: Jessica-Wind Abolafia sends draft documents to the FBI for review and signature regarding an unspecified matter related to anti-trafficking work.

events.title: FBI Agent Provides Update on Approvals
events.description: An FBI Special Agent informs Jessica they were out of the office and are working through internal approvals, expecting to finalize forms in the next few days.

events.title: Finalized Forms Delivered
events.description: The FBI Special Agent emails Jessica-Wind Abolafia with the finalized forms attached, completing the review process.

keyFacts: The document is a 2022 email chain showing ongoing coordination between the FBI's New York Field Office (Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk) and Sanctuary for Families' Anti-Trafficking Initiative.
The correspondence concerns the review, approval, and finalization of unspecified forms or documents related to anti-trafficking work.
The FBI Special Agent's identity is redacted in the provided text, indicated by placeholders like '(NY) (FBI)' and blank fields.
The communication suggests a collaborative working relationship between law enforcement and a non-profit service provider for gender violence survivors.
